response.overview: What happens when a glamorous express, with high government officials, wealthy merchants, concubines and a gang of brigands on board, speeds towards the small town of Hanshui, where escaping bank robbers, corrupt officials, and gamblers await? Well, let's just say the Titanic had a smoother maiden voyage.
response.tagline: All aboard for non-stop action on the wildest ride of your life!
response.title: Millionaires' Express

titles.title: Shanghai Police - Die wüsteste Truppe der Welt

cast.name: Teddy Yip Wing-Cho
cast.character: Passerby Watching Fong Tin and Siu Hon Kiss
